resources.description:
In RDF/Turtle format. Has been zipped as a tar.gz.

Base Graph URI: http://data.gov.uk/dataset/epims

Schema namespace: http://data.gov.uk/dataset/epims#

Data namespace: http://data.gov.uk/dataset/epims/resource/b3d4a3b4-93d2-46bf-ae12-4c440687ff01#
resources.name: Property Data 08-03-12 in RDF-Turtle

organization.description: A group for anyone interested in open data related to Civil Society (voluntary, civic and social organisations). Things to do: 1. Join the Civil Society Open Data Interest Group 2. Subscribe to the Civil Society Open Data Email List 3. Add datasets to the Civil Society Open Datastore (here) What is Civil Society? "Civil Society is composed of the totality of voluntary civic and social organizations and institutions that form the basis of a functioning society, as distinct from the force-backed structures of a state (regardless of that state's political system) and commercial institutions of the market." Wikipedia
organization.title: Civil Society
organization.name: civil-society

name: epims-lod2
notes:
Data files from e-PIMS, Government's Property and Land asset database containing details of location, tenure and other key attributes for each asset. It includes details about the buildings, any vacant space and occupiers.

Converted into RDF/Turtle by Daniel Lewis on behalf of the Open Knowledge Foundation (OKFN) for the LOD2 EU Project.

Original Data published under OGL by the Cabinet Office on data.gov.uk here:
http://data.gov.uk/dataset/epims/resource/b3d4a3b4-93d2-46bf-ae12-4c440687ff01
title: Central Government Property and Land including Welsh Ministers estate
